Configuration.Name: L1=L2=20m_central_apx12p5mm
Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 19250 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 150 config.guide = 'ga' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 91.6833 config.beamcenterz = 94.501 config.drive()

Transmission.SetupScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(38, 100) # Drive attenuator to 240 driveAtt(240) # !!!

Scattering.SetupScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # !!! Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(38, 0) driveBsz(254)
